Name: Saturday of Piercing Screams
About the game: Vanquish your foes with bricks, your own weight or bombs. The Plot Become hero of the 1917 revolution in Russia! Pioneers of the Fist occupied the Castle Samozbor. You are the best liquidator Red Army does have. Your task is to crush the members of counter-revolution and escape your doom. Saturday of Piercing Screams features: Legendary cursed infinite-spanning castle 64 levels Destructible environment 914 pioneers Flexing between levels Enduring but simple gameplay
